summary: Mikkel (15) lives a good life with his mother in Oslo. Here he has heaps of friends and spends most of his day on a skateboard. When his mum gets a new job, Mikkel has to move to a small ... See full summary »
cast: Ida Elise Broch|Espen Klouman Høiner|Hilde Lyrån|Sebastian Stigar|Peter Stormare|Rune Temte|Bjarte Tjøstheim|Sindre Tveit|Benedicte Westbye
title: Switch
